website_summaries.verdict: An effective cleanser that will do away with dead skin each an every time, leaving your skin glowing.
pros: Nearly mimics a professional treatment, this cleanser is an all around player in terms of cleansing skin and improving its texture
Ideal for those with acne or aging skin
This tiny bottle delivers a strong dose of skin rejuvenation
cons: Stronger than other brands, this cleanser is best tested first before using on a regular basis

customer_reviews.title: Cures cyst under the skin
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I usually get cyst like boils around the time of my menstruation. I've tried everything and have even been to the hospital to get them surgically removed. It's usually under the skin and feels like a hard ball. In efforts to find a solution, I started to do heavy research and learned the benefits of salicylic acid. Since using this product, when I have a flare up I use this product and within a few days my cyst is gone.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica De Pena

customer_reviews.title: Reduces fine lines and wrinkles
customer_reviews.text: I use this once a day, I’m on my second bottle now. I bought the first bottle in November or December. Usually I get Botox every four mo this but after using this daily I haven’t had Botox in 7 months. Over time it really does fade fine lines. It’s not for sensitive skin as it is harsh, and you do need a moisturizer after using this product. But if you want to eliminate fine lines this works. My skin is somewhat sensitive and I haven’t had any issues. Heads up the first few times you use it you may have some acne because it clears out your pores. I promise this product works
customer_reviews.author: Laura foster

customer_reviews.title: Do not be afraid
customer_reviews.text: I was so nervous to use this product for the first time...I read and re-read blogs about it and I had nothing to fear. It was so easy to use. Clean your face, use the pads, leave on face for 90 seconds (first time) increase time for each additional use...not to exceed five min. so far so good. I am hoping to use this as part of my routine. I am so glad I found this product and inexpensive compared to going to a spa.
customer_reviews.author: Maddy M.

customer_reviews.title: Best face cleaner I have ever used - by far
customer_reviews.text: It may seem pricey, the bottle may seem small, but you only need a dime-sized dollop of this stuff to thoroughly wash your entire face. I use it daily, and the bottles typically last me 6+ months. It lathers like shampoo and smells like a high-end spa, and you can literally feel the texture of your skin change after one use. By FAR the best salicylic acid-based face cleaner I have ever used, and I've tried them all.
customer_reviews.author: Mike McG

customer_reviews.title: Great product and company
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching desperately for something to help me with these dots or bumps appearing all over my face, I have no idea what they are but I read that salicylic acid should help . I have used this product twice so far and I can already see the bumps diminishing I am truly amazed. I am tempted to stock up on a ton of bottles in case this is discontinued that's how much I love this product so far
customer_reviews.author: JEN

customer_reviews.title: Take it slow!!
customer_reviews.text: When I first started using the cleanser I broke out in little red bumps but I started using it 2x a day right at first because I thought my skin was already broken in with my prior daily use of benzoyl peroxide, salycilic said and retin-A. I was so disappointed but I didn't give up. I slowed down to every other day just once a day and my skin calmed down. Almost two weeks in and I'm loving this!! It deep cleans so thoroughly and smells great! I love tea tree oil. Here's to hoping for better and better results!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Best ever!
customer_reviews.text: By far my favorite face wash ever. I have used this every evening for about a year. I alternate with as often face wash for mornings. This stuff is strong! However it certainly has the perfect chemical exfoliation for wrinkles, blocked or enlarged pores and acne! You will not be sorry you tried this stuff. Just be sure to moisturize after because it is very powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: My face feels clean and smooth after washing my face. I don't think it exfoliates my face tho. I still like it although it smells a little like bathroom cleaning material. It smells good but like a bathroom lol. I don't know maybe it's just me. It's okay but not great. It's a so so for me.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Gray Frost

customer_reviews.title: It works. Read the instructions!!!
customer_reviews.text: It was the missing piece to my skin care regimen. I have cystic acne and use retinol all over my face and then sulfur on breakouts. Adding this face wash at night, on oily areas, has resulted in clearer skin. I wrote this reviewing after finishing the first bottle. Note: read the instructions bc this is strong stuff.
customer_reviews.author: LisaStar

customer_reviews.title: WORKS SOOOOO GOOD
customer_reviews.text: This product is like having a deep cleaning facial at a spa treat yourself once or twice a month to clear your skin of problems or just to look your best it does work amazing for acne areas before they spread. Are usually use this more in the summer time especially on chest and back area due to the heat and humidity it will definitely help with any breakouts that you have in those areas
customer_reviews.author: holly bergman

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE - VERY VERY STRONG
customer_reviews.text: I used this product 4 times with my mia cleanser. The morning after using it for the fourth time, I woke up with extremely raw inflamed skin as well as puffy eyes. Due to the delayed reaction, I'm concluding its not an allergy, but instead a harsh stripping of my protective skin barrier. This product is very very strong and should be used very carefully. I'm on day 2 of healing with continued raw inflamed skin and puffy eyes.
customer_reviews.author: onewithlife

customer_reviews.title: My Skin Peeled
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would have a very mild salcylic acid in it. After three days of use my skin started peeling. This is as strong as the Salcylic skin peel. Follow the directions and use every other day. Definitely not for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Monique Bergeron

customer_reviews.title: Just as discribed
customer_reviews.text: I have used this.product before and the product delivers as discribe. Cleanes the skin and renews and provides a beautiful more firm face. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Pad58

customer_reviews.title: The most effective cleanser for me
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this cleanser for over six months, twice a day with my Clarisonic Aria, and I am sticking with it. It really cleans better than the typical salicylic acid cleansers I tried before (Neutrogena, Phisoderm, etc). It has played a part in preventing acne breakouts. I haven't gotten any zits for the past two months. Of course, there were other major, drastic modifications in my lifestyle that contributed to my now zit-less complexion (daily probiotics, strict vegan diet, drinking tons of water, wearing no makeup/no sunblock/no moisturizer on my face at all) but I can sincerely say that this cleanser has played a part in keeping me zit-free.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Better looking Skin.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product. I have really oily skin and have seen a different since only a few times of using this Product. Love the results so far , will write another review later. Have been very pleased with all the products I have ordered from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Hansen Burns

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fresh quality and works well for blackheads - 2-3 x per week use.
customer_reviews.author: D.Johnson

customer_reviews.title: It works if you are consistent!!
customer_reviews.text: Listen. I don’t always leave reviews but I feel compelled to. This stuff works! It’s a gentle exfoliant, so you will flake (with daily use) but there is no extreme peeling. It can be drying, but that’s an easy fix— moisturize (I use Shea butter). I saw great improvement as far as sebum production and pore size after a week. Find your rhythm and see how frequently you should use it... be consistent!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it works
customer_reviews.text: I've been struggling with adult acne. I started using salicylic products for several years but it never maintained 100%. Although the percentage isn't published this is stronger than the 2% products sold in stores. Every now and again I get a stubborn one that I have to use a clay wash on but this is usually good. I moisturize with pure cold pressed jojoba oil by Aura after. And I use SAL 3 soap in between as a daily, the combo is working.
customer_reviews.author: Miss D

customer_reviews.title: I love this cleanser!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cleanser! When I use it, I can feel it really getting into my pores and clearing up my skin in addition to getting rid of makeup, oil and whatever else might be there after a whole day of work. My skin has never been clearer since starting this. My face feels soft and completely free of make-up and oil, and has a tighter, nicer look. This is the 4th time I have bought it and I just wish it came in a larger size, perhaps with a pump. I hope it is never discontinued. Life changing.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie S.

customer_reviews.title: Skin feels extremely clean when I use this!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not a fan of cetephil because I don’t feel clean but when I use this salylic acid cleanser I feel confident that my skin is truly being cleansed! Literally feels like a skin detox!!! Love this soap!
customer_reviews.author: JAMIE

customer_reviews.title: Family Favorite!
customer_reviews.text: This product is life changing! I’ve tried so many other products, and this is the only product I’ve used that works for my adult breakouts and oily skin. I go months without a single blemish! I also have a teenage son that has had a difficult time fighting breakouts, and I have him hooked on this now, too! I’ve been using it for years now, and will continue to do so!
customer_reviews.author: Bunnylove

customer_reviews.title: Allergic reaction to product also gave me chemical burn
customer_reviews.text: Made my face swell up 3x it size Gave me a chemical burn that caused my eye to be swelled shut for 2 days had to go to ER and be put on 3 prescription. I did follow directions only used it 2 days in a row. I would have given it 0 stars but that’s not an option and I believe letting people know the reaction I had is important.
customer_reviews.author: Heidy

customer_reviews.title: Works, but expensive
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job at cleaning oily skin. I have an oily very acne prone skin, but my face feels very clean after usage. The only inconvenience is that it is very expensive. I am not sure exactly for how long I will be able to afford this!
customer_reviews.author: Dely

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I suffered a breakout on my face due to an allergic reaction to a product. I had purchased this sometime ago as a preface to a salicylic peel. I no longer do the peel, but I used this to combat the breakouts. It worked, but was not too drying on my face. I still use it about once a week to keep adult acne at bay and to combat ingrown hairs.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: This is pretty nice. I've used other products whose major component ...
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty nice. I've used other products whose major component was salicylic acid and they all burned. This one doesn't have an offensive smell (more like a light cleaning product smell), easy to use and you can feel a difference in your skin after you've washed it off. It isn't overly drying like Neutrogena makes my skin feel, but as another reviewer suggested, I'd use a good moisturizer afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Does not exfoliate as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: So where do I start. This product smells bad, makes your skin overly dry, and will cause more breakouts than you already may have. Not good at all for sensitive skin types and will definitely not help anyone reach their goals in preventing blemishes or alleviating any you may already have.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it but pricey
customer_reviews.text: Love it but it's expensive! My skin does well with Salicylic Acid so I ended up purchasing a Salicylic Acid cleanser from another line because this is just too expensive to repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Fedora

customer_reviews.title: Much gentler than "scrubs" and more effective!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing and prompt results in minimizing pores and exfoliating mature, dry skin gently. Improvements were seen within 3 weeks of regular use (2-3 times per week). Only small amounts required to provide a sudsy face wash.
customer_reviews.author: villageRN

customer_reviews.title: My skin looks fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: I am on my second bottle of this and I am super pleased with it. I use it every morning after St Ives Apricot Scrub. My skin feels great after and it certainly has stopped me breaking out. I'm in menopause and my skin, which never broke out in my teens, had suddenly become a bit acne prone. I don't know if everyone could use this daily but it works for me. Maybe every other day would be best for some depending on skin type.
customer_reviews.author: M. Scales

customer_reviews.title: Works but drying
customer_reviews.text: Definitely exfoliates, my skin feels very soft afterwards because it's that fresh new layer of skin, but probably too fresh because it needs a few days to heal afterwards and feels pretty dry. I'm experimenting with how long I rub it in and how often I use it to get the benefits without the dryness.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa W

customer_reviews.title: cleanser
customer_reviews.text: Since I ran out of my favorite salicylic cleanser--I tried this and will continue ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Brenna

customer_reviews.title: ONE OF MY BEST FINDS!
customer_reviews.text: My skin is so smooth. I absolutely love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lilibeth

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: So of course I had high expectations based on all the 5 star reviews. I have been using this for about a month. I found this product to be a good cleanser but that's about it. I have very sensitive skin. I was really hoping that this stuff was as strong as others made it out to be but I never peeled once. I never even got red. My pores are a little cleaner but it has not made me clear. I only got a tingling feeling a couple times but never a burning sensation. I have been able to use this product as a daily cleanser. Hopefully with continued use I will get my money's worth.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Mclaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Right away differents on face for teens with acne!
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied , saw results on my face with an a week. I'm recommending it to my sister. My 14 year old who suffers from acne use it as well . It gives him a burning sensation on all the pimples n black head on face while appling it. It goes away as well pimples have within just a wk of use .
customer_reviews.author: Mayra

customer_reviews.title: My favorite face wash
customer_reviews.text: This face wash is amazing, especially if you have oily or acne prone skin.It will leave your skin matte, but not dry,&you won't have any oil build up for about 8hrs.I have cystic acne,&it this wash has really helped to improve my condition.i hear salicylic acid is ideal for penetrating acne deep down & cleansing.Has a very mild sting at 1st, but nothing bad, your face will feel wonderful after using this product & you can use this with or without moisturizing afterwards, as it isn't over drying.Its an awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Cleared up blemishes and it's not too strong, I've ...
customer_reviews.text: Cleared up blemishes and it's not too strong, I've tried so many cleansers and I think this is my third or fourth bottle. Works great
customer_reviews.author: Chris Reichman

customer_reviews.title: Good exfoliator
customer_reviews.text: I've order this product a couple of times now, and I'm pleased with how it works. Your skin definitely feels cleaner and healthier after using it. Still have some breakouts, but I don't expect any product to be 100% effective, 100% of the time. And it's powerful stuff, so I don't use it daily, but I really like the way my skin feels after I use it and you can really feel that the exfoliating works.
customer_reviews.author: mtcrabby

customer_reviews.title: Pre Peel Made My Skin Glow!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product!!! It makes my skin glow and helps fight my acne and blackheads. I mainly bought this product for my Salycic acid treatment but I use it on the regular like twice a week to keep my glow And face clear. Im Definatley going to buy again!! =)
customer_reviews.author: Dianneoo7

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful cleanser that really deep cleans and helps reduce break ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful cleanser that really deep cleans and helps reduce break outs. It's great to use before a chemical peel. Its a great product.
customer_reviews.author: deedee

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: I believe this is helping me! I have clear fluid filled pimples that dont go away and this has mostly taken them awAy and improved my overall face. Also, taking strong probiotics.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Magic !
customer_reviews.text: So far the best face wash for acne prone skin. I have tried so many products but this wins the race. It is clearing up my blackheads and acne. It's like magic in a bottle! I use is two to three times a week. My friend recommended it to me and I would recommend it to everyone with problematic skin.
customer_reviews.author: BasilAnum

customer_reviews.title: using this for over one year
customer_reviews.text: My son has been using this product for about 18 months. For the first year, we also did thye salicylic acid peel twice a month. He had really really bad acne and this combination worked ! He still has a few pimples but they are so much less huge and painful than before. Now we need to take care of some of the scarring. This is a great face cleaner that doesn't strip his skin too dry. I am sure he will continue using it for the next year or so.
customer_reviews.author: France

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for pregnant women's changing skin!!
customer_reviews.text: I am 23 years old and I am suffering from hormonal breakouts BAAAAD during my pregnancy. There's isn't a spot on my face that looks like it usually does :( It's so upsetting seeing constant breakouts of pimples, whiteheads and blackheads. I have tried everything under the sun to fix it (proactiv, coconut oil, best selling acne face washes and creams) and nothing has worked UNTIL NOW!!! I highly recommend this cleanser its the best purchase I've ever made for my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Great for Acne Prone Skin as well as mature skin.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic product. I use it about once to twice a week to get a deep exfoliation. Works so much better than what you can find at the drugstore. It keeps my 52 year old skin smooth & free of breakouts. Perfect Image has great products. I highly recommend their other products too!
customer_reviews.author: Avid Online Sopper

customer_reviews.title: I use this every other day, in addition to ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this every other day, in addition to using Retin A. This product lathers well, helps keep my face (and shoulders) clear. I have purchased this on several occasions. It is expensive but a little actually goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: LAWLS

customer_reviews.title: this was a huge disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: saw absolutely no positive improvement after using daily for a month. for the price, this was a huge disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Elyza

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: best face wash ever i have very sensitive skin and i break out easy even those annoying white heads ever since i use this i cleared up yay i use it every night finally found something that keeps on working
customer_reviews.author: danny

customer_reviews.title: Follow directions and you will see great results!
customer_reviews.text: Wish I would have discovered this product line sooner... By far the best cleanser I have ever used... After the first use seen and felt immediate results... Skin is softer smoother and more even toned
customer_reviews.author: Jamee Cox

customer_reviews.title: and can be a useful part of your daily skin care regimen
customer_reviews.text: Works as described, and can be a useful part of your daily skin care regimen. Cut visits to expensive spas down by having a healthy daily regimen of high quality skin care skin products at home!
customer_reviews.author: dlh

customer_reviews.title: Love Everything this Company Makes
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this product, as well as the salicylic acid peel and the glycolic acid peel. I have been highly satisfied with the quality of every purchase. Additionally, they each come with very clear instructions for use, which is good because these are potent products. However, if you use them as recommended, the results are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Sete Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.text: I love this exfoliating gel. This gel cleans my pores better then any other product i have ever tried. Other products say deep cleaning but this product means it. I have sensitive skin with large pores. This perfect image Pre-peel salicylic deep gel exfoliating really un-clog's hard to un-clog pores.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Summers

customer_reviews.title: Great pre-peel cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I tried the skin peel using my regular cleanser and it worked okay but after I used this recommended cleanset and the results were outstanding. This combination worked better than the expensive peels my dermatologist have me. I get lots of compliments about my glowing complexion.
customer_reviews.author: Lees Lady

customer_reviews.title: GOOD EXFOLIATING WASH
customer_reviews.text: I've used this in conjunction with the lactic acid peel. I thinks it works for the peel. But my skin was dry afterwards so don't apply a lot. Apply a dime amount has recommended you don't need a lot this is powerful stuff. It maybe costly but it lasts a long time because you don't need a lot.This is not for a everyday wash but its good for an exfoliating wash and it smells good.
customer_reviews.author: Gera

customer_reviews.title: Amazing face wash!
customer_reviews.text: I love Perfect Image. I started with a level 1 peel and just implented this face wash in. I use this face twice a week 5 days prior to the peel. I use their moisturizer after both. I have good genes but I am 43 now. People always think Im in my 30s. Understand the key to skin care is consistency. You aren't going to see a change in one use. Try this brand, follow a routine and you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: shortstack

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Cleans properly, leaves the skin Very Clean, Breathable, Glowy and Smooth. It is a good Aid for you against the unexpected breakouts, it will treat the problem very fast. I am satisfied with this order. ty
customer_reviews.author: Cicim

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended for acne prone adults
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome. My face has never been smoother and it definitely helps reduce blemishes. I would highly recommend this to anyone who struggles with adult acne and oily skin.
customer_reviews.author: IT_Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Ready To Buy and Test Every Perfect Image Item Just Because This Face wash Is Sooo Fantastic!!
customer_reviews.text: This Has Got to be the best face wash I have ever Used. I LOVE IT THE PERFECT TINGLE! I WILL DEFINITELY BUY IT AGAIN AS SOON AS ITS FINISHED!
customer_reviews.author: LIZ

customer_reviews.title: Helped eliminate my cystic acne!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing face wash. I use it daily as my skin does not easily self exfoliate. I had adult cystic acne (minor but problematic on cheeks) and this, combined with vitamins and Aczone had cleared my face and I no longer get the large painful cysts!!
customer_reviews.author: MidnightBaker

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, best face wash ever!!!!
customer_reviews.text: By far my favorite face wash to keep acne away. I have always had issues with problematic skin, getting worse as an adult. This face wash is the only product the keeps my acne away.
customer_reviews.author: rebekah Spradlin

customer_reviews.title: I use many Perfect Image products & love them
customer_reviews.text: I use many Perfect Image products & love them. My teenage son who has had acne issues is seeing great results with this cleaner & I, in my mid 40's love how clean my face feels (without drying out) after I use.
customer_reviews.author: AutumnB

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT. THIS IS PRODUCT IS REALLY WORKING ON MY SKIN AFTER THAT I USED FOR 3 DAYS I CAN SEE AND FEEL MY SKIN IS DIFFERENT. My skin is lighter ans clearer. It is bit strong at first but after i used more than 2 weeks it's fine on my skin.
customer_reviews.author: SAOSD2000

customer_reviews.title: SIMPLY AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a forty-something -year-old female that struggled with acne for most of my life and this product has made such a difference for my skin. This is my first bottle and I cannot imagine my life without it from now on. SIMPLY AMAZING!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: maria g sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Pretty strong stuff
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize how strong this stuff would actually be! It works super well, so really brush it on then rinse it off right away!!! Don't wait unless you want the full on peeling. It won't be thick peeing but noticeable for sure. I am glad I bought this for my arsenal.
customer_reviews.author: Brit

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This product has changed my life. At first, my skin could only take the product for about 15 seconds and I had to quickly rinse off. I really had to build up my skin tolerance. But even after the first use, I could tell that my skin was smoother and clearer. Now I use it about twice a week which is perfect for my skin. In addition to this, I've had lower incidence of flare-ups during "that time of the month". And, I've even convinced my husband to use it.
customer_reviews.author: AN

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This cleanser changed my face.... I no longer have breakouts and use this everyday, even though it is supposed to be a few times a week...
customer_reviews.author: K. Slayton

customer_reviews.title: Pre-Peel Salicylic Deep Gel Exfoliating Cleanset - Enhanced with Tea Tree
customer_reviews.text: I recommended this product to everyone especially eith acne problem., this is a face cleanser that I got 3 benefits in one product. Besides from pre-peel salicylic deep gel, its also expoliating cleanser and enhanced with tea tree.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Gets your skin REALLY clean
customer_reviews.text: This makes your skin tight and really clean. I have been using it a few times a week without it drying out my skin. I have oily skin to begin with so this is helping. I also make sure to use it prior to using the Perfect Image Salicylic Acid 20% Gel Peel treatment. I believe the peel will work better when the face is squeaky clean.
customer_reviews.author: Julie R

customer_reviews.title: Great product for drawing the acne to the surface
customer_reviews.text: Great product in that it draws out and acne to the surface in preparation for the Salicylic Acid peel. I am starting the peel process now so cant say the final results.
customer_reviews.author: balley49

customer_reviews.title: Acne Gone!
customer_reviews.text: If you have acne this stuff is amazing! I've tried SO many different things and this is the only thing that has worked!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I hope this product never goes away!
customer_reviews.text: This wash has helped so much with my adult acne that has just decided to pop up in my 30's. In the beginning I used it everyday, and within a day or 2 I had no new breakouts. I use it about 3 times a week now to keep everything under control, but could probably use it daily regardless. It will dry your face out so you need a heavy duty moisturizer. It does not burn or anything like that and foams nicely! I really hope this product never goes away, it has been a life saver!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I guess I can say that this stuff didn't do much and for the amount of money they ask for the product it should work really well but it didn't and the shipping charges was ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special
customer_reviews.text: I didn't notice anything particularly wonderful about this. It didn't break me out though, and I have sensitive skin. But I didn't use it much.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly S.

customer_reviews.title: Was a skeptic but....
customer_reviews.text: I was a skeptic about this product and now I am not! My pores look smaller, my skin is less oily and my skin is soft and it glows! I've only been using it for a little over a week now and am happy I purchased this product!
customer_reviews.author: Ashanti919804

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! Clear up my daughter skin very fast! Thank you :)
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Really remarkable product!
customer_reviews.text: As someone in her early 40s with dry, sensitive skin, I didn't think that this product would help much. I purchased it more for my teenage son than for myself. However, it had such good reviews and I love other Perfect Image products, so I thought to give it a try. I've been using it for about six months now (around twice a week) and all I can say is WOW! My skin hasn't looked this good since I was 25. Clear with smooth texture. I use the Perfect Image moisturizer too and I think the combo of them together has made all the difference. This is one product I will use over and over.
customer_reviews.author: Photo Junkie

customer_reviews.title: Finishing my first bottle, so far, happy with the results
customer_reviews.text: I am just about finished with my first bottle. So far, my acne has calmed more and my skin is smoother. I think this is a product that will be maintained in my daily regimen in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Gently Strong
customer_reviews.text: I use this product in the evening time. The product works great to clear out my oily-combination skin. The effect is noticeable after the first use. It leaves my face super clean, glowing, and smooth, without dry feeling. Pores are minimized, and breakouts are in control. I alternates it with Paula's Choice Skin Balancing Cleanser in the morning since I consider it might be too strong to use it twice daily.
customer_reviews.author: Khoop Panhinkong

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic wash. It is great used as a skin ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic wash. It is great used as a skin prep before a peel is performed as it prepares the skin by deep cleansing and removing any bacteria and debris that causes breakouts.
customer_reviews.author: Faceplace

customer_reviews.title: Finally I have found a cleanser that has helped my ...
customer_reviews.text: Finally I have found a cleanser that has helped my adult chin acne!! Salicylic Deep Exfoliating gel is FABULOUS!!! I have replaced all of my other RX cleansers (that didn't help) and will continue to use this.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Mahoney

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I have oily skin, and this is a fantastic cleanser for my skin. It makes my face look smooth, soft and less oily. My pores seem to look smaller and my face feels clean after every use. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: HealthFitnessBeauty

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff I use as daily skin cleaner.
customer_reviews.text: Face feels fresh, and clean after cleaning with this. I do notice "some" pimple reduction. And as a man notice the smell is not over powering.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer X

customer_reviews.title: Really good!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a prewash to a tca peel. Per directions you use this for a week prior to prep the skin...but, day 1 after using it, people asked what I had done.... : ) I use this now about 3 times weekly follow up with a good moisturizer and the peel is still under the sink....
customer_reviews.author: Texaricaño

customer_reviews.title: My skin is starting to finally look better. My dark acne sports and hyper skin pigmentations ...
customer_reviews.text: My skin is starting to finally look better. My dark acne sports and hyper skin pigmentations are lightening up. I will be getting this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Ardissoni

customer_reviews.title: Favorite face cleanser
customer_reviews.text: Love this cleanser. I use daily and one bottle has lasted 6 months using a pea sized drop. Really gets face clean (even mascara) without over drying.
customer_reviews.author: Poppy Sue

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I re-order this all the time it last a long time and worth every penny for use in-between peels
customer_reviews.author: amanda Suan

customer_reviews.title: Maintaining oily skin
customer_reviews.text: This face wash is great. You can instantly feel your skin tightening after washing. If you use it too often, it can seriously dry out your skin. I use it twice a week to maintain my very oily skin.
customer_reviews.author: Montreal Kat

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Perfect image products for 6 months now and really love them. I would recommend this and their other products. I have purchased a few of there items and I really love the way it makes my skin feel. well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Traci DelPurgatorio

customer_reviews.title: very well
customer_reviews.text: great product as a prep for main peel. But I end up using main level 2 peel. My sensitive acne-prone skin very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: david's wife...

customer_reviews.title: fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: I received my item very fast. I noticed it helped immediately reduce oil production. I'm going to use in conjunction with my herbal peel, the directions states to use 5-7 before peel, or 2-3 times per week for maintenance. Very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: dexter bennett

customer_reviews.title: After wash, skin felt tight and clean. The ...
customer_reviews.text: After wash, skin felt tight and clean. The beads exfoliate very well. No need to scrub hard. Needed very little product. I'm impressed
customer_reviews.author: GodSpeed

customer_reviews.title: Best for Cleansing Pores
customer_reviews.text: I love this cleanser for my 66 year old, yet still oily, skin with clogged pore issues. I use this as a regular cleanser every day - it's the best!
customer_reviews.author: Mooferpoochie

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: One needs to be careful to keep the cleanser away from lips, nose and eyes. It does a wonderful job in exfoliating skin and leaves a healthy glow. I use it after I wash my face before I shower. I rinse it off in the shower and wash my face again to be sure all of the product is removed. It's worth the little extra time.
customer_reviews.author: Penelope Storm

customer_reviews.title: Pre-Peel Salicylic Deep Gel Exfoliating Cleanser - Enhanced with Tea Tree Oil & Green Tea Extract
customer_reviews.text: As the name implies, this is to be use before a chemical peel and also to maintain after a peel. Well, I use it a few times a week as part of my daily regime. I like how it makes my skin so clean, smooth and soft after using it to cleanse my face. However, it can be a little drying if you use it too frequent. So, my verdict : may use as a normal cleanser but not too frequent and definitely not daily.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Kira

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product Worked Immediately To Clear My Skin
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality product that I will re-order.
customer_reviews.author: A. Bancroft

customer_reviews.title: Skip it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Image has great products, but this one is not one of them. It doesn't really do the job. My skin doesn't feel after using it. After giving it several weeks of trial, it ended up laying in my drawer and I am back to the Obagi Foaming Cleanser.
customer_reviews.author: snortapuss

customer_reviews.title: Great skin cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! Does excatly what it's suppose to do. My skin feels so soft,smooth & clean! I use it almost every day. Please make a bodywash! Price went up $10.
customer_reviews.author: Jmazz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Smells good and has a rich lather. Cleanses the face well even when you're just using hands. Use a good moisturizer afterwards to avoid excessive drying of the skin if used daily, which I had a hard time not doing. It just makes your skin feel so darn baby soft
customer_reviews.author: Regis S.

customer_reviews.title: three months
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for a few months between peels and sometimes as a daily cleanser. I still had a couple breakouts but i hAve pretty bad acne. It worked better then most products ive tried. I did notice the redness of old scars has been reduced with using the cleanser,peel and hydrating lotion.
customer_reviews.author: Sonja H.

customer_reviews.title: PLEASE HELP!
customer_reviews.text: Usually a fan. My last bottle had the consistency of water and smelled weird. Now I have to print label and return to get my stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Andy Marnach

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use as a prep for an at home peel. Seemed to work pretty good and I continued to use it after the peel when I had breakouts and it worked well on my breakouts as well. The bottle lasted a long time as you do not have to use much. Also it can be a little drying to your skin. I will purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Pauline

product_meta.title: Salicylic Acid Deep Exfoliating Gel Based Cleanser, Professionally Formulated Salicylic Acid Peel Peel Prep Cleanser, Enhanced with Tea Tree Oil and Green Tea Extract - Perfect Image
feature_bullets: EXFOLIATES AND CLEARS CLOGGED PORES - This salicylic acid face cleanser with glycolic acid targets both the surface and deeper levels of the skin. It helps unclog pores through exfoliation, giving you a more refined skin texture.

REDUCES INFLAMMATION - Our exfoliating cleanser is enhanced with Green Tea Extract which contains epigallocatechin (EGCG). It helps reduce inflammation and fight off free radicals that cause damage to your skin cells.

STOPS FUTURE BREAKOUTS - Used as a natural alternative to benzoyl peroxide, Tea Tree Oil has been proven to be effective in reducing the appearance of acne and breakouts. Having clear skin is possible with our gel exfoliator cleanser!

GETS RID OF IMPURITIES - Specifically formulated to thoroughly cleanse and prepare the skin for a chemical peel, our salicylic and glycolic cleanser combines AHA and BHA to effectively remove oils, impurities, and dead skin cells on the surface.

SPA-LIKE RESULTS - Achieve salon and spa-like results from the comforts of your home with Perfect Image skin care products. Our Salicylic Acid Gel Cleanser gives you the power to maintain a more brightened, balanced skin appearance.
